name: The Ranking Game
description:
A statement will be read aloud and everyone in the group must rank themselves according to where they think they would fall compared to the rest of the group. On the count of three, without discussing it, you must all hold out fingers to show where you think you would rank. For example, if the statement is "Where do you rank in order of oldest to youngest" and you know you're the second oldest then you would hold out two fingers to rank yourself as second. If someone else puts up two fingers then you both must drink.

There are over 60 unique statements that will be shuffled randomly with each new game.
